attributes.action: use the full force of the law to ensure beef flavour monster much goes back into production
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Monster Munch is obviously smaller than it was "in my day" and the removal of the roast beef flavour is clearly one of the reasons behind the reduced effectiveness of the Armed Forces.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
